#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
		int t,n,sum,last,len;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(n==0 || n==1)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		sum=0;
		if(n%2==0)
		{
			sum=n;
			n--;
		}
		
		len=(n-1)/2; 
		last=n-1; 
		sum=sum+(len*(2+last));
		sum=sum/2;
		cout<<sum<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
